servinfo.title: Solenoid Valves (Shift Solenoid-A, Shift Solenoid-B, TCC Pressure Control Solenoid and Pressure Control Solenoid) Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Pull out fluid level gauge and lift up vehicle.
Remove drain plug (3) and drain A/T fluid.
Install drain plug (3) with new gasket.
Remove oil filler tube (2) and A/T oil pan (1).
Disconnect shift solenoid-A connector (1), shift solenoid-B connector (2), TCC pressure control solenoid connector (4) and pressure control solenoid connector (3).

servinfosub.title: Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Solenoid Valves (Shift Solenoid-A, Shift Solenoid-B, TCC Pressure Control Solenoid and Pressure Control Solenoid) Inspection:4 A/T

servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure to install solenoid valves, noting the following points.

item.ptxt: For details of solenoid valves and their connectors installation, refer to Automatic Transmission Unit Assembly:4 A/T . Use new O-ring.
For details of A/T oil pan installation, refer to Automatic Transmission Unit Assembly:4 A/T .
Tighten exhaust No.1 pipe bolts & nuts and exhaust bracket bolts & nuts.
Fill A/T fluid and check fluid level according to procedure described in A/T Fluid Change:4 A/T .
Check for fluid leakage after warming up A/T.
